We refer to Wikipedia articles on product design for help. The lock screen shows the current date and time, which is when she received the item. The on-screen text appears after she starts describing the product. A yellow sticky note is shown after she explains how she takes notes. The words appear after she lists the benefits of the app. She selects a template for a new notebook before writing anything. Therefore, the correct order is 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

We refer to Wikipedia articles on note-taking for help. The events are as follows: First, she starts with showing pages about amino acids (Option A). Then, she explains how she writes lecture notes (Option B). Thirdly, she shows bullet points under “genetics” (Option C). Fourthly, she describes how she highlights key statements and uses a different color for diagrams (Option D). Fifthly, she mentions that textbook notes are basically useless and switches to Anki (Option E). Lastly, she urges focusing on functionality over aesthetics and promises a video next week (Option F).

Therefore, the answer is (B).
